testcaseName: Child entered season at 8 years of age, received dose before 9. Forecast another dose
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child enters the flu season at age 8 years, received their first dose, but is now 9 years old. Per 2019-20 ACIP flu recommendations, the patient needs a second dose.
reasonForChange: V4.4: Rolled test cases forward from 2019-2020 season to 2020-2021 season.
